Package presentation

Class QuoridorGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • presentation.QuoridorGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class QuoridorGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class communicates with the controller and contains the game's JFrame.
    Since:
    25-05-2024
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setTime

        public void setTime​(int time)
        Set the time of the game mode
        Parameters:
        time - the time that the players have to play

      • createBeginnerMachine

        public void createBeginnerMachine()
                           throws QuoriPOOBException
        Creates a begginer machine Player for QuoriPOOB and integrate it to the Game
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - Throws an Exception in case there is other Machine created, or in case the given parameters are wrong, or there are two players already.

      • createIntermediateMachine

        public void createIntermediateMachine()
                               throws QuoriPOOBException
        Creates an intermediate machine Player for QuoriPOOB and integrate it to the Game
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - Throws an Exception in case there is other Machine created, or in case the given parameters are wrong, or there are two players already.

      • createAdvancedMachine

        public void createAdvancedMachine()
                           throws QuoriPOOBException
        Creates a advanced machine Player for QuoriPOOB and integrate it to the Game
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - Throws an Exception in case there is other Machine created, or in case the given parameters are wrong, or there are two players already.

      • createPlayerHuman

        public void createPlayerHuman​(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String color)
                       throws QuoriPOOBException
        Creates a Human Player for QuoriPOOB and integrate it to the Game
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Player
        color - The respective color of the Player
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - Throws an Exception in case the attempt to more than two players, or create a player with wrong parameters.

      • createBoard

        public void createBoard​(int size,
                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​int[][]> specialSquares)
                 throws QuoriPOOBException
        Creates a Board for QuioriPOOB it its possible.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the Board
        specialSquares - The respective specialSquare
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - The exception in case the Board is created with wrong parameters, or before create two players.

      • addWalls

        public void addWalls​(int normal,
                     int temporary,
                     int longW,
                     int allied)
              throws QuoriPOOBException
        Add the given number of walls to each player.
        Parameters:
        normal - The given number of normal Walls.
        temporary - The given number of temporary Walls.
        longWall - The given number of long Walls.
        allied - The given number of allied Walls.
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - Throws an Exception in case there is an attempt to add the Walls and there are not players created or a Board created, also if the parameters are wrong.

      • moveToken

        public void moveToken​(java.lang.String direction)
               throws QuoriPOOBException
        Moves the token to the given position.
        Parameters:
        direction - The respective direction where the token is moving.
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - Throws an exception in case the parameters are wrong or the action is not possible.

      • addWallToBoard

        public void addWallToBoard​(java.lang.String type,
                           int initialRow,
                           int initialColumn,
                           java.lang.String squareSide)
                    throws QuoriPOOBException
        Add a wall to the board by the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of board
        initialRow - The initial row where is located the board (reference to the Square).
        initialColumn - The initial column where is located the board (reference to the Square).
        squareSide - The side of the referenced Square where the wall is located.
        Throws:
        QuoriPOOBException - Throws an Exception in case the given parameters are wrong or the action is not possible.

        public Player getPlayerPlaying()
        Returns the player that is actually playing.

        The player that has the turn to play.

        Return the number of each type of wall the players have.
        Returns:
        the number of walls with their respective quantity
